name: Nod
description:
How to play
  • Tap anywhere or press any key to nod
Game Features
  • Four possible endings
  • Branching dialogue written in a custom data format
  • Created in 24 hours for Ludum Dare #26, with the theme "minimalism"
Credits
  • Design, code, and art by Rose Abernathy
  • Made with Flixel
  • Music: "Martini" by Rick Dickert from freesoundtrackmusic.com
